text: The discography of Stars, a Canadian indie pop band, consists of eight studio albums, two remix albums, six extended plays, one video album and eighteen singles. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of studio albums, with selected chart positions and certifications !
